name: Downtown Runner
description:
Welcome to Downtown Runner.

An infinite runner with very fast paced gameplay. Reach the highest score or try and get as far as possible before being smashed against the traffic.

The game takes place in a semi-populated city, jammed with traffic everywhere. Make your way across and try and reach new heights.

The game comes with it's own set of pickups and ways to travel rather different. Give it a shot.

Controls:

Arrow keys to Sidestep and roll

Spacebar to Jump
